metadata.synopsis: One-liner and HasMet for the vampire book club in the Park. As in they read vampire books. They aren't vampires. Probably.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to any of the three people in the book club in the CTY_Main_A Park at coords -92, 30, -50

0.speaker: Kepli
0.text: Sorry, would you mind leaving me be? These books won't discuss themselves.

1.speaker: Kepli
1.text: Oh, hello there! Feel free to listen in, but only members may participate in discussion.

2.speaker: Kepli
2.text: I think next time we'll hold our meeting inside.
